backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report listing two landing-page cleanup tasks and associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend components and config files.
frontend/docs/landing-customization.md: Guide explaining how the landing page works and how to change the APK download link.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS defining OKLCH variables, dark-mode tokens, and base Tailwind resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper applying dark theme and React Query before rendering the landing page.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Empty placeholder component for admin panel.
frontend/src/components/landing/download: Central APK download handler opening a fixed Mega URL in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Mouse‑tracking glow effect that disables on touch devices.
frontend/src/components/landing/GlassPan: Reusable glass-effect wrapper component with optional strong variant.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Fau: Stylesheet for the FaultyTerminal WebGL canvas container.
WebGL shader‑driven animated terminal effect with noise, glitches, and mouse interaction.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Flo: Empty placeholder for floating mockups component.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Her: Canvas‑based particle background with subtle blur and center aura.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Central config for landing page behavior, including CTAs and shared APK download URL.
Centralized text copy for all landing sections plus section ID constants.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Top-level landing page composing all sections and cursor glow effect.
frontend/src/components/landing/Responsi: Standard max‑width container wrapper with responsive padding.
Section wrapper adding scroll‑reveal animation and spacing.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Section rendering large ASCII 'KARM' text using a Three.js component.
Displays cult‑line headline and subtext without any images.
Renders the final call‑to‑action section with a headline, APK download button, and footer credit.
Displays the hero section with animated background, main tagline, and primary/secondary CTAs including APK download.
Animates psychological impact lines sequentially when scrolled into view using IntersectionObserver.
Shows social proof lines from landing copy inside a centered text section.
Renders three descriptive feature blocks sourced from landing copy in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/three/As: Implements a Three.js ASCII text filter with custom shaders, rendering logic, and mouse‑reactive distortion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and utilities for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Computes a parallax offset based on scroll position for an element reference.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Reveals an element once it enters view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom variables, theming, and utility classes for glow, glass effects, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including existing features, new feature requests, and metadata for a cleanup task removing an image.
